view_definition_query: select alarms.id as alarmid, alarms.timestamp, alarms.status, alarms.company, machines.name as machine_name, failuretypes.name as ft_name, alarmtypes.code, alarmtypes.name as at_name, failuretypes.id as failureid, machines.id as machineid from failuremanager.alarms as alarms left join failuremanager.machines as machines on alarms.idMachine = machines.id left join failuremanager.alarmtypes as alarmtypes on alarms.idAlarmType = alarmtypes.code left join failuremanager.failuretypes as failuretypes on alarms.idFailureType = failuretypes.id
